section.title: Abstract
section.p: Syntext Serna handles XML documents of different types. You might wish to customize the GUI layout for the documents of the type you wish.

Syntext Serna offers you a unique functionality to customize and tailor the GUI layout to the needs of a particular user or an enterprise. Feel free to arrange the buttons, toolbars, menus, and dockable dialogs the way you like.
For instructions on how to customize the GUI layout, see .
This chapter deals with information about GUI layout customization proper. To learn how to make the customized GUI layout persistent, see .
